title: Autodesk Reiterates Third Quarter and Fiscal Year 2016 Business Outlook at Annual Investor Day
content:
Autodesk, 
      Inc. (NASDAQ:ADSK) is hosting its annual Investor Day at the 
      Autodesk Gallery in San Francisco. Here, Autodesk will provide an update 
      on its transition to a subscription-based business model and plans for 
      expanding its market opportunity. The company is also reiterating its 
      business outlook for the third quarter and fiscal year 2016. 

read more
